required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Non - Interventional, Retrospective Study Of Cabozantinib Treatment In Patients With Unresectable, Locally Advanced Or Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma Who Progressed After Previous Treatment With Checkpoint Inhibitors
clinical_study.official_title: Non - Interventional, Retrospective Study Of Cabozantinib Treatment In Patients With Unresectable, Locally Advanced Or Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma Who Progressed After Previous Treatment With Checkpoint Inhibitors

brief_summary.textblock: To demonstrate cabozantinib efficacy when administrated as treatment for metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma (mRCC) after prior therapy with Check Point Inhibitors (CPIs)

primary_outcome.time_frame: From start of index treatment until 6 months of follow up or end of the treatment or death whichever occurs first

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From start of index treatment until end of the treatment or death whichever occurs first
From start of index treatment until the earliest of death, end of study database, or evidence of Progressive Disease
From start of index treatment until death or end of the study whichever occurs first
From date of index treatment response and the earliest date of progressive disease
From start of index treatment until treatment discontinuation
From start of index treatment until treatment discontinuation
From start of index treatment until treatment discontinuation
From start of index treatment until treatment discontinuation

clinical_study.condition: Locally Advanced or Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma

arm_group.arm_group_label: non cabozantinib Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors (TKI) arm

intervention.description: Intervention description (FDA Label): kinase inhibitor indicated for the treatment of patients with advanced renal cell carcinoma (RCC).

intervention.intervention_name: All authorized TKI monotherapies in advanced RCC: sunitinib (Sutent), Pazopanib (Votrient), Axitinib (Inlyta); Lenvatinib (Lenvima) in combination with everolimus (Afinitor), sorafenib (Nexavar)
intervention.description: As per authorized FDA label in advanced RCC
intervention.arm_group_label: non cabozantinib Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors (TKI) arm

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Evidence of metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma (mRCC)
- Receipt of Check Point Inhibitors as the latest treatment for mRCC administrated before index treatment: Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors
- Receipt of Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors
- Patients who received care at a US Oncology Network site
Exclusion Criteria:
- Age below 18 years old
- Patients enrolled in a clinical trial at any time during index treatment
- Patients receiving treatment for another documented primary cancer diagnoses during the study
